traits.name: Intellect Fortress
entries: The braxat's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The braxat makes two Greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge}
entries: The braxat exhales a 15-foot cone of acid. Each creature in the cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 26 (4d12 damage) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The braxat casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):
